<title level="1" right="Trait">[Evolution](/Traits.aspx?ID=394)</title>

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 57 <sup>2.0</sup>

Feats with this trait affect your eidolon instead of you, typically by granting it additional physical capabilities.
name: Evolution
